price: seolah-olah mereka belum pernah tinggal404) di tempat itu. Ingatlah, kaum Samud mengingkari Tuhan mereka. Ingatlah, binasalah kaum Samud.
arabic: كَأَن لَّمۡ يَغۡنَوۡاْ فِيهَآۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ ثَمُودَاْ كَفَرُواْ رَبَّهُمۡۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّثَمُودَ
footnotes: *404) Demikian cepatnya mereka dihancurkan oleh guntur itu, sehingga mereka hancur lebur, tanpa bekas, seolah-olah mereka tidak pernah ada.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ka-an lam yaghnaw fīhā alā inna thamūdā kafarū rabbahum alā buʿ'dan lithamūda
